Michael James Owen

A tribute to the greatest footballer and colour comentator to have ever graced your eyes and ears.

Michael Owen, circa 2014.

Born in September 14 1979 Michael James Owen aka the Kingpin of goals became one of England's most prolific goalscorers. His illustrious career on the pitch gifted his fans with many a banger goal and his off the pitch performance as a BT Sports... pundit? colour comentator? has gifted the football world, nay, the humanity itself with absolute bolockslines that challenge the verry foundation of the listener's world view. Indeed Mike's post footballer career has made many raise questions about the verry nature of reality and has given hope to thousands. After all, if Mike can keep getting paid to talk, so do you can do anything you have ever set your eyes to.

Big Mike also boast 89 international appearances with England scoring 40 goals

After his glamorus career in the pitch, Mike became a pundit for BT Sports, gifting us with deep and meaningful commentary, such as:

"Footballers these days often have to use their feet."
Michael Owen - Profesional Pundit
and
"If there is rain about it makes the floor wet."
Michael Owen - Profesional Pundit
and who can forget
"It's hit the facial part of his head."
Michael Owen - Profesional Pundit

If you'd like to know more about the walking memeone of history's greatest men,check his wikipedia page.
